body.transcript:
Hello, thank you for calling Harmony Music School. My name is Philip Martinez. How may I assist you today?

Hi, this is Brittany Green. I'm feeling a bit disappointed with the way my data has been managed.

I'm sorry to hear that, Brittany. I will do my best to help resolve this issue for you. Could you please let me know what specifically has been disappointing?

I recently changed my address, and it seems like your records still have my old address listed. I need to make sure all my details are correct.

I understand. Let's get those details updated for you. Can you please provide me with your current address?

Sure, it's 255 New Harmony Lane, Apt zero three, Melodyville.

Thank you for that information, Brittany. Could I also verify your phone number to ensure our records are up-to-date?

Yes, my phone number is four one five, five five five, nine eight seven six.

Perfect, I have updated your records with the new address and verified your phone number. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help.

Thank you for your patience, Brittany. I apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Have a great day!
